description: [FIN13](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1016) has used the PowerShell utility `Invoke-SMBExec` to execute the pass the hash method for lateral movement within an compromised environment.(Citation: Mandiant FIN13 Aug 2022)

external_references.description: Ta, V., et al. (2022, August 8). FIN13: A Cybercriminal Threat Actor Focused on Mexico. Retrieved February 9, 2023.
